p:
Next, related meteorological factors were added as covariates into the optimal ARIMA model to establish the multivariate ARIMAX models. Finally, ARIMAX (1,0,1)(1,1,0) 52 with 0–1 week lag precipitation was identified as the optimal ARIMAX model, with a minimum AIC of − 578.58 and a minimum BIC of − 578.13 (Ljung−Box test: χ
2 = 0.00548, P = 0.10).
